whatsNewHTML:
What's New

Version 0.87.23
- [fix] Bug fixes
Version 0.87.21
- [new] Added support for one more weather server
- [fix] Fixed dst problem (refresh weather to correct)
- [fix] Weather display corrections
- [fix] Optimizations
- [fix] Bug fixes
description: A full featured, fully customizable digital clock and weather forecast widgetThe widget features the following:- 3 widget sizes, 4x1, 4x2 and 5x2- Flip animation- Several widget skins to choose from- Different weather icon skins- Different fonts for the time- Display the next alarm, next calendar event and week number on the widget (optional)- Several widget hotspots (most of them can be user defined to launch specific applications)- Automatic location (from cell/wifi or GPS) or manual- Automatic weather update interval (15 min, 30 min, 1, 2, 4, 6, 8 hours) or manual- Detailed current weather forecast display that includes the following:- Local time (for current location)- Sunrise and sunset time for current location- Humidity, pressure, chance of rain, dew point, visibility, UV index and wind conditions- Current condition, temperature, low and high temperatures- Last weather update time- Background according to the weather condition and day/night- Optional display of the current moon phase- 24 hourly weather forecast- 24 hourly wind forecast- 7 day future forecast- Future forecast details (sunrise, sunset, moon phase, wind, humidity and chance of rain- World weather: Choose to display weather information for any number of different locations worldwideThe application is localized in the following languages:Afrikaans, ‎العربية‎, български, Català, 中文 (简体), 中文 (繁體), Hrvatski, Čeština, Dansk, Nederlands, Suomi, Français, Deutsch, Ελληνικά, , ‎עברית‎, Magyar, Bahasa Indonesia, Italiano, 한국어, Lietuvių, македонски, Polski, Português (Brazil), Português (Portugal), Română, русский, Српски (Ћирилица), Srpski (Latinica), Slovenčina, Español (Spain), Svenska, ไทย, Türkçe, Українська, Tiếng ViệtPlease report any problems, suggestions or requests via e-mail
descriptionHTML:
A full featured, fully customizable digital clock and weather forecast widget

The widget features the following:

- 3 widget sizes, 4x1, 4x2 and 5x2
- Flip animation
- Several widget skins to choose from
- Different weather icon skins
- Different fonts for the time
- Display the next alarm, next calendar event and week number on the widget (optional)
- Several widget hotspots (most of them can be user defined to launch specific applications)
- Automatic location (from cell/wifi or GPS) or manual
- Automatic weather update interval (15 min, 30 min, 1, 2, 4, 6, 8 hours) or manual
- Detailed current weather forecast display that includes the following:
- Local time (for current location)
- Sunrise and sunset time for current location
- Humidity, pressure, chance of rain, dew point, visibility, UV index and wind conditions
- Current condition, temperature, low and high temperatures
- Last weather update time
- Background according to the weather condition and day/night
- Optional display of the current moon phase
- 24 hourly weather forecast
- 24 hourly wind forecast
- 7 day future forecast
- Future forecast details (sunrise, sunset, moon phase, wind, humidity and chance of rain
- World weather: Choose to display weather information for any number of different locations worldwide

The application is localized in the following languages:
Afrikaans, ‎العربية‎, български, Català, 中文 (简体), 中文 (繁體), Hrvatski, Čeština, Dansk, Nederlands, Suomi, Français, Deutsch, Ελληνικά, , ‎עברית‎, Magyar, Bahasa Indonesia, Italiano, 한국어, Lietuvių, македонски, Polski, Português (Brazil), Português (Portugal), Română, русский, Српски (Ћирилица), Srpski (Latinica), Slovenčina, Español (Spain), Svenska, ไทย, Türkçe, Українська, Tiếng Việt

Please report any problems, suggestions or requests via e-mail

topReviews.reviewText: Previously 5⭐ but just like before, updates killed it. Sucks. Flat out sucks. Every time, every phone, updates kill it.

Well i love having everything right there on the main screen in big enough view to read at a glance. Though i just now was able to update it as had not been updating the weather portion lately. But now i updated  it seems to be working which i am glad for. Hope it keeps working in the future.

Love this, does suffer the occasional functional fopa though, but nothing long lasting or enough to make me junk it. Would be better if it read time from system/network instead of (what I assume is their own database) as UK time changed to b.s.t at the weekend and this is still on G.m.t.  Assume it'll right itself by this coming weekend tho.
Used to work great. Now only updates weather manually, and sometimes that doesn't work either. Hoping all these updates will fix the problem. Going to uninstall if it continues to have issues.
Nice App! Easy to look at and understand. Lots of information. Good job!
After "bug fix" still doesn't show correct weather
New update is again displaying incorrect weather.
Great App. Easy, simple but loaded with basic weather data. Would have loved if the high tide and low tide timing and levels were also displayed for coastal locations.
Love this app, but lately it hasn't been updating locations automatically so I do it manually and it still doesn't update most of the time. Please fix.
This is a nice app but needs widget update for larger phones that have 5 tiles across.
I love it other than the weather is never right, but all the apps for weather and clock are wrong...I'm holding onto it for a little longer hoping for a fix

Not totally in love with this app. The at a glance is visually appealing,  but not so much once you open it. I hate that it shows the temp every 3 hours. I liked it better every hour. And the actual weather is almost always wrong. Days it rains, it says it's sunny and clear.

Doesn't Work...have it set for 15 minute refresh ....hasn't updated for 3 hours.
Does everything else well for me, but the night clock was nice.
Great clock,  crap weather service.
It's pretty good I like it
Best clock and weather app I've found yet. Good work !
I'm tired of those updates that screw up everything, Lo/hi temps are way off. Nexus 5. I'm downloading yahoo weather for now and keeping this for clock and alarm.
They read our reviews and fix the issues.
The weather info doesn't up date like it's supposed to
Working properly,finds almost any location.
Weather will not update ,have to go in program to get right temperature
All of the immediate details that you require and an easy to read and follow tap menue
never update. now outside temp is 75deg. but still shows 41deg. about 4 months old temp.
Especially like the Moon phases. It's put together nicely. No problem. Cheers!
No contact with server, no weather updates. Pretty useless.

Still waiting for the app to be fixed. Yesterday it said the wrong temperature and were experiencing heavy snow when it was sunny and 50. Hasn't read correctly for several weeks now even after numerous updates.
Works well.
Love the style options. Works great so far on my old Droid x.
Excellent app
Certainly one to recommend
It's ok.
Clocks

Excellent
